00020 #include <errno.h>
00021 #include <sys/socket.h>
00022 #include <unistd.h>

00026 #include <rdkcore/network/tcpserversocket.h>

00028 namespace Network {
00029 
00030 TCPServerSocket::TCPServerSocket() throw() :
00031     socket(-1) {
00032 }
00033 
00034 TCPServerSocket::TCPServerSocket( unsigned short port, unsigned short backlog ) throw( TCPException, NetException ) :
00035     socket(-1), address( port ) {
00036     
00037     this->backlog = backlog;
00038     
00039     bind();
00040 }
00041 
00042 TCPServerSocket::TCPServerSocket( const InetAddress& address, unsigned short backlog ) throw ( TCPException ) :
00043     socket(-1), backlog(backlog), address(address) {
00044     
00045     bind();
00046 }
00047 
00048 TCPServerSocket::~TCPServerSocket() throw() {
00049     unbind();
00050 }
00051 
00052 void TCPServerSocket::unbind() throw() {
00053     if ( socket >= 0 ) {
00054         ::shutdown( socket, SHUT_RDWR );
00055         close( socket );
00056         socket = -1;
00057     }
00058 }
00059 
00060 void TCPServerSocket::bind( unsigned short port, unsigned short backlog ) throw( TCPException, NetException ) {
00061     
00062     unbind();
00063     
00064     this->backlog = backlog; 
00065     
00066     address = InetAddress( port );
00067     
00068     bind();
00069 }
00070 
00071 void TCPServerSocket::bind( const InetAddress& address, unsigned short backlog ) throw ( TCPException ) {
00072     
00073     unbind();
00074     
00075     this->backlog = backlog; 
00076     
00077     this->address = address;
00078     
00079     bind();
00080 }
00081 
00082 TCPSocket* TCPServerSocket::accept() throw( TCPException ) {
00083     // Accetta una connessione TCP
00084     int newsocket;
00085     InetAddress newaddress;
00086     socklen_t addr_len_call = sizeof( struct sockaddr_in );
00087     
00088     if ( ( newsocket = ::accept( socket, (struct sockaddr *)&newaddress.getAddress(), &addr_len_call)) == -1 ) {
00089         throw TCPException("Unable to accept an extern connection");
00090     }
00091     
00092     return new TCPSocket( newsocket, newaddress );
00093 }
00094 
00095 void TCPServerSocket::bind() throw( TCPException ) {
00096     // Get a socket from kernel
00097     if ( socket < 0 )
00098         if ( ( socket = ::socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0) ) == -1 )
00099             throw TCPException("Unable to open an AF_INET stream socket");
00100 
00101     // DC: Avoid damned "port already open" if the process dies without shutdown and close on the listening socket
00102     int reuseAddr = 1;
00103     if (setsockopt(socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &reuseAddr, sizeof(reuseAddr))) {
00104         unbind();
00105         throw TCPException("Unable to set SO_REUSEADDR on the listening socket");
00106     }
00107     
00108     // Socket binded to the port
00109     if ( ::bind( socket, (struct sockaddr *)&address.getAddress(), sizeof(struct sockaddr)) ) {
00110         unbind();
00111         std::ostringstream oss;
00112         oss<<"Unable to bind AF_INET server socket to address: "<<address.getIPAddress()<<":"<<address.getPort();
00113         throw TCPException(oss.str());
00114     }
00115 
00116     // Attiva l'ascolto sulla porta
00117     if ( listen( socket, backlog ) == -1 ) {
00118         unbind();
00119         std::ostringstream oss;
00120         oss<<"Unable to listen AF_INET stream socket to address: "<<address.getIPAddress()<<":"<<address.getPort();
00121         throw TCPException(oss.str());
00122     }
00123 }
00124 
00125 }
